Pre-Game Insights: The match between Brazil and Ecuador will take place on Friday, September 6, 2024, at 22:00 at Couto Pereira in Curitiba.
The match is part of the seventh round of the World Cup 2026 Qualifiers.
Brazil, coached by Dorival Júnior, is in 6th place with 7 points, having two wins, one draw, and three losses.
Ecuador, coached by Sebastián Beccacece, is in 5th place with 8 points, having three wins, two draws, and one loss.
Ecuador lost 3 points at the beginning of the Qualifiers due to the Byron Castillo case.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be broadcast on Globo and SporTV, with real-time updates available on CNN Esportes.
